table.name: vtiger_bhsblacklist
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsblacklist` ( `bhsblacklistid` int(19) NOT NULL, `bhsblacklist_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsblacklistid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bhsblacklistcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsblacklistcf` ( `bhsblacklistid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsblacklistid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
